about_the_game:
Open World Multiplayer Drifting


The game is in early access and still under development. Skid Island is not a complete game.


Drift around on Skid Island together with your friends, on Windows, Linux and Android!

Drive around:

  • Drift, jump and drive fast to make money
  • 6 "Driftparks" with lots of space and layouts for drifting
  • Set highscores in drift zone challenges

Buy and customize new cars:

  • Buy a new ride with your earned cash
  • Paint your car
  • Install a spoiler

Other features:

  • Limited (Logitech) wheel support
  • Limited controller support
  • Visual vehicle damage


This is what's available so far. There are many features that aren't ready to be implemented yet, and some are still in planning phase.
For more details on development progress, visit our website, or join the discord!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated intel/AMD graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should be playable on low settings on almost all somewhat recent hardware/devices.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
